title: Test
text:
Just a test to see if I can have multiple selections other than the “home” and the “about” selection. Nothing to see here… probably.
Strider 1, Fox 2.

title: About
text:
Mathematician, Applied Emphasis. This website is mostly used as a testing ground for all my experiments, so this is getting constantly updated when I have the chance as I learn the basics… than then advanced stuff.
Disclaimer: I am not a professional programmer, consider this website as me following a tutorial and going through a crash course on JavaScript, CSS, etc.
-Glen

title: Untitled STG
text:
“Untitled”S”hoo”T”ing “G”ame”
Engine: Shooting Game Builder
Barely made past through the planning stage due to schedule conflicts and pursuing other passions. TL;DR: it was basically “what if Infinite Stratos (yes, that mediocre anime) were planes instead.”
Concept Renders drawn by yours truly (yes, they are kind of awful.):



Crimson Lotus - the default 1P ship. Pretty generic.





Azure Cyanus - The 2P ship. It was made to be a derivative of Crimson Lotus because I don’t know if STG Builder can handle two players at once.


 Sprites:



Big Zako - It was too big to be a common enemy… sort of.





Yes, the resolution of the game was THAT small. How can you tell?





Ditto.
